resources.string: Build your own world by iGap right now.
It takes only few minutes to join iGap community!
iGap attaches the utmost importance to your security and privacy using the individual encryption algorithms and guarantees a safe and secure connection between you, your friends and family.
You can have one-on-one or group chats and even create your own channel and add members in order to share information with millions of people.
You have an authority to transfer any file with any size and type or save them on your cloud storage; and then share anything you’d like to with anyone you’d want to.
You can make thoroughly free and secure voice calls to anyone on iGap and save your money. iGap voice call is P2P-based with no server\'s interference in voice transmission.
Let’s stop waiting! \n iGap is thoroughly free. So, just now build your own world freely.
Enter your Nickname and select a photo as your Profile Avatar/Picture
Please confirm your country name and code then enter your phone number without its first zero/0
Recheck and confirm your phone number! We\'re sending a verification code to this number
Tap OK if this entered phone number is correct or simply modify it if wrong.
You have logged into your account on another device and iGap has sent a verification code via its Notification Service in your account, Please check another device and enter the verification code.
iGap recognizes the code automatically; if not, enter it manually. (Please ask the app to resend the verification code if you have not received it yet)
Unfortunately; the verification code is invalid , Please enter the correct one manually.
Please enter your phone number without the first zero/0
The number of characters is less than the limit
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
Now you are deleting your account; your phone number is :
iGap automatically fills the field of Deletion Code; otherwise, fill it manually .
Are you sure you want to clear history?
Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
This device does not have a camera.
Your GPS is off, do you want to turn it on?

Photos, videos and all other files saved on your cloud storage could be removed from your device in order to free up space. All these removed files and media are stored on cloud storage and could be downloaded and saved again if needed.
Relaunch app if shut down by user or system. This will ensure you all notifications will be shown.
Keep a low impact background connection to iGap to receive notifications. Enable for reliable notifications.
Undo all custom notification settings for all your contacts and groups
Are you sure you want to undo all custom notification settings?
Only when the screen is on
Only when the screen is off
Will likely mark this as an error despite being correct. You may want to add 91211111 will likely mark this as an error despite being correct. You may want to add
Please enter a description about group
Are you sure you want to remove the admin role from this member?
Are you sure you want to kick this member?
Are you sure you want to remove the moderator role from this member?
Please enter your first name or last name
Can\'t save picture, please try again
Not anyone can join. They can only be added as members by the admin(s).
Anyone can join public channels via searching or receiving the invitation link.
User is blocked, no possibility to verify
Bad payload: Invalid starting Message ID
The user is already in this conversation.
There is no active user with the given Peer ID.
Bad payload: first name or last name is required
You have got Blocked by This User
Bad payload: Invalid ID of the first message
No Other Messages to be Viewed.
You are forbidden to send a report.
You have already reported this user.
You are forbidden to do this action.
No such file is found for request.
can\'t do it please try later
Did not you receive a text message?
Do you want to add this phone number to your contacts list?
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
(If you delete your account, all sort of files received as messages will be deleted permanently!)
Are you sure you want to kick this admin out?
Are you sure you want to kick this moderator out?
Sorry, you are not allowed to send any messages to this chat.
Are you sure you want to terminate this active session?
Are you sure you want to terminate all active sessions?
There is no registered user with given username.
Verification code is locked for a while due to too many tries.
Verification code has been forwarded frequently.
User is blocked for his/her request
Do you want to convert this chat to a group?
Do you want to delete this chat?
will be offered in the future
Are you sure you want to clear this chat history?
Are you sure you want to delete this group?
Are you sure you want to leave this group?
"Are you sure you want to leave this room?"
Are you sure you want to delete this room?
Are you sure you want to delete this channel?
Are you sure you want to leave this channel?
Are you sure you want to clear history of this room?
Are you sure you want to sign out of your iGap account?
Do you want to convert this channel to private?
Do you want to convert this channel to public?
Do you want to convert this group to private?
Do you want to convert this group to public?
USER GET DELETE TOKEN MAX TRY
USER GET DELETE TOKEN MAX SEND
You need the storage permission for going on.
Are you sure you want to clean up all data in local chat rooms?
There is no room with this ID
Who can invite me to Channels?
Who can invite me to Groups?
Please try to enter the first 5 characters of username
Enter at least 3 characters to search
You didn\'t make any call yet
Selected color cannot be set on your device
File can not save to selected folder

Please wait for the process to finish (You are not allowed to send messages to more than 10 Unknown Users regularly at the same time; after getting to number 10, you get stopped until the end of countdown timer)
You are allowed to create up to 25 Groups and/or Channels
You can set a password that will be required when you log in on a new device in addition to the code you get via SMS.
eg: Who is your Favorite teacher?
Change old question with answers for recovering password.
eg: Who is your best friend?
Do you really want to remove password?
Please add your valid e-mail! It is another way to recover your forgotten password
Hint can\'t be the same as password
"Password has to be more than 2 characters
"hint can\'t be the same as password
Password is locked for a while due to too many tries.
You are talking with your other devices
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. We are aware of this error. Please be sure we are fixing this problem, all you have to do is only click "Reset".
Are you sure you want to clear all incoming and outgoing calls?
Enter the confirmation code sent to Email
A code has been sent to your email in order that your email address will be verified and confirmed then.
We\'ve resent the confirmation code to your email
"If you choose one of the periods in the following and never use your iGap account during the certain time, your account will be destructed and deleted spontaneously."
Are you sure you want to reset all changes with color to default?
This user dose not have iGap yet, send an invitation?

Clearing the local database will delete the texts of cached messages and compress the database to save internal disk space. iGap needs some data to work, so database size will not reach zero. \n\n This operation can take few minutes to complete.

Cached data on your device are the uploaded and/or downloaded files as photos, videos or documents, which must be cleared occasionally not to stop your device working or slow it down. Whenever you want to see them again, it is sufficient only to tap on them for downloading.
The location status and other features of map are disabled. To use all the capabilities, turn the switch on first.
You will be visible to others with no status. Are you sure to continue?
Enabling Nearby will result in getting your and others\' status visible to both. Are you sure to continue?
Disabling Nearby will not only result in hiding your status from others, but you won\'t also be able to see others\' status within your certain range. Are you still sure to continue?
Notice! Activating "Map Status" will result in making your location visible to others. Please be sure about it before turning on.
Only the users within your 5KM radius distance are visible to you if their Map Status in ON.
The app will be locked after each time you choose and you need to unlock it at the beginning.
If enabled, you can take screenshots of the app, but the system will display your chats in the task switcher even when the passcode is on. You may need to restart the app for this to take effect.

When you set a passcode, a lock icon will appear on top of the main chats page. Tap it to lock or unlock the app. \nNote: you can set only numbers as a PIN or a combination of numbers and letters as a Password with no restriction. \nIf you forget your passcode, you just need to log out once and log in again with no need to enter the PIN/Password.
If you have forgotten your PIN/Password, there is no way to recover but only to log out and log in again. Are you sure to log out?
The passcode must contain at least 4 numbers and/or letters.
Are you sure to block this User?
Are you sure to unblock this User?
Oops! No user nearby has turned on her/his map yet
You can add a few lines about yourself. anyone who opens your profile will see this text.
You have exceeded the allowed number of characters. You can use only 70 characters for Bio.
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s message(s)?
